definition: to crush together (in a crowd)/to make friends/to check (accounts)
to crush/to knock sb down with a vehicle

sentences.english: It is fabricated from drawn or rolled sections in standard or special materials.
sentences.chinese: 它是製作標準或特殊材料的冷拔或冷軋的部分。

sentences.english: The spalling reason of the roller surface for cold rolling is complicated.
sentences.chinese: 冷軋工作輥表面發生剝落掉塊的原因是複雜的。

sentences.english: Cold-rolled steel impeller metal external rotor motors welding.
sentences.chinese: 冷軋鋼板葉輪金屬外轉子電機弧焊。

sentences.english: Cold-rolled strip compactly wound coils with anti-oxidation oil are supplied in V.
sentences.chinese: 冷軋帶鋼鋼卷卷好後塗上抗氧化油，並使用V。

sentences.english: The shearing machine is one of the most popular single unit equipment in the production of cold rolled steel strip.
sentences.chinese: 剪切機是冷軋帶鋼生產中使用最廣泛的單機設備之一。

sentences.english: Rolling force model is the crucial model for process control in cold rolling.
sentences.chinese: 軋製力數學模型是冷軋工藝控制系統的中樞模型。

sentences.english: A robust repetitive controller for roll eccentricity compensation of cold mill is designed.
sentences.chinese: 設計了用於冷軋機的軋輥偏心補償的魯棒重複控制器。

sentences.english: Ball joint rod cold rolling project of zhejiang finite bearing co. ltd.
sentences.chinese: 麗水新億特自動化技術有限公司冷軋滾珠絲桿項目。

sentences.english: One kind of speed synchronization control method for deflector roll of cold rolling mill is introduced in the paper.
sentences.chinese: 介紹一種冷軋機偏導輥的速度同步控制方式。

sentences.english: A very thin sheet of stainless steel that has either been temper rolled or passed through a cold reduction mill.
sentences.chinese: 非常薄的經過硬化冷軋或減厚冷軋處理的不鏽鋼片材。

sentences.english: A very thin sheet of stainless steel that has either been temper rolled or passed through a cold reduction mill.
sentences.chinese: 非常薄的經過硬化冷軋或減厚冷軋處理的不鏽鋼片材。

sentences.english: Practical use of the radiation tester to measuring thickness of cold_rolled sheet is also described.
sentences.chinese: 簡述了射線測厚儀在冷軋帶鋼厚度測量中的應用情況。

sentences.english: The article describes the design and calculation of air-cushion piler at the rear end of the cross-cut shear in cold rolling mills.
sentences.chinese: 簡要介紹冷軋機橫切機組尾部氣墊垛板的設計計算。

sentences.english: It shows that the cold-rolled deformed bar is a new kind of construct…
sentences.chinese: 從而表明冷軋鋼筋是一種前途廣闊的新型建築材料。

sentences.english: Application of the cold rolled ribbed steel wires and ho is introduced in the building by an example.
sentences.chinese: 通過設計實例介紹了冷軋帶肋鋼筋在工程中的應用。

sentences.english: The lamination factor is an important quality index of non-oriented silicon steel strip.
sentences.chinese: 疊片係數是冷軋無取向電工鋼的重要質量指標。
